biotools.summary: Program for the analysis of single SNP association in genome-wide studies. The tests implemented include: Binary (case-control) phenotypes, single and multiple quantitative phenotypes, Bayesian and Frequentist tests, the ability to condition ypon an arbitrary set of covariates and/or SNPs, and various methods for dealing with imputed SNPs.

bioschemas.name: SNPTEST
